actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend section 312 of title 38, United States Code by providing a 3-year presumptive period of service connection for malignant tumors (cancer) which develops within 3 years from the date of separation from active service.

summary.text: Provides a three-year presumptive period of service connection of malignant tumors of cancer which develops within three years from the date of a veteran's separation from active service. (Adds 38 U.S.C. 312 (6))

titles.title: A bill to amend section 312 of title 38, United States Code by providing a 3-year presumptive period of service connection for malignant tumors (cancer) which develops within 3 years from the date of separation from active service.
